title: FT: mid to high grade Mathewson White Cap and Cobb Red PB, On Sov, Off Tolstoi
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: FT: mid to high grade Mathewson White Cap and Cobb Red PB, On Sov, Off Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
Thinking about moving my T206 group in a different direction, aka, thinning it out a bit and upgrading.  Looking to trade my uncommon backs for common backs + $.   I'd listen to offers on the Cobbs, but something would really have to wow me to move them without finding an upgrade in the process.

I have these for trade:
Piedmont 150 Christy Mathewson White Cap PSA7  ($9900 OBO)
Polar BearTy Cobb Red PortraitPSA4
SovereignTy Cobb Bat OnSGC5
TolstoiTy Cobb Bat OffPSA2

Looking for upgrades to these common backs (which would then be up for trade as well):
Christy Mathewson PortraitPSA4, looking for 5+
Nap Lajoie ThrowingPSA4., looking for 5+
Ty Cobb (Red/On/Off) Have 4's and 5's so looking for 5-6 grades
Ty Cobb Green 3-5

Thanks
John P
